author: Hugh Janus
comment: Nice compromise between analog and digital. Super easy to tell what time it is. Hoping to see more customization options in the future, specifically choosing what info displays on the bottom and what order to cycle it through. Also an option to remove the shadow on ambient so that the entire number shows up.
title: Digging This One, Using it Daily

author: Daniele Moro
comment: Does not work. Only displays the time, everything else doesn't work. When I tap on the weather/calendar/etc, it says "loading" indefinitely and nothing shows up. UPDATE: Fixed after checking permissions of the app itself. However, I expect the app to ask for permission instead of just crashing. Just bad code.

author: A Google User
comment: Great Update! I am truly enjoying this watch face. There is one thing I would like on the next update is more HD like text. One can see the anti-aliasing a but when it is in ambient mode. I have the huawei watch. Great app!

author: Andrew LeDawson
comment: The darkened time doesn't show up in Ambient Mode on my Sony Smartwatch 3 (probably because it declares low bit mode but actually can display grayscale).  Card previews overlap with bottom text.  Otherwise a well designed face.
title: Almost there

author: Andrew Wright
comment: Not sure if the dev is still active, but I would love it if the"tap here to do x" features were optional, as I just want a watchface without all the bells and whistles

author: Nick D'Auria
comment: It really needs a vibrate on connect/disconnect function added though
title: Daily watch face

author: Stefan H.
comment: I like the fact that its minimalistic on the surface but you can see so much more with little effort and its still clean.
title: Nice watch face!

author: Paul Jablonski
comment: Super cool watch face, I get to have everything I need under my finger, great battery life.
title: Sweet!

comment: Would recommend highly, has a bug or two in the interactive options but nothing too major.

reply.author: VIPO
reply.content: I will continue working to improve it!

title: Good watch face

author: Ira Rosenzweig
comment: Such a gentile Elegant look. And yet, softly but cleverly,  a turbo interactive info provider.

reply.author: VIPO
reply.content: Thanks Ira for you support! Happy to hear you!

title: Simply Brilliant

author: Daryl Denson
comment: Love the look on my 360 and the new interactive interface makes it so much more intuitive
title: Love it

author: Fidias Diaz
comment: Please  update app.to make this compatible with Android wear 2.0 paired with iOS.

author: Alex Boeru
comment: Thank you for your work ! It is possible that in the future to add more fonts options for numbers ?

reply.author: VIPO
reply.content: Hey! Thanks for your support! Yes, I will add fonts option. :)

title: Amazing

author: Nick Cooter
comment: Only suggestions I have is adding the hours text layer over the minutes layer. Hard to see especially if in sunlight. Maybe more configurable options like additional date formats, bold text option, and only temp for weather instead of cloudy, sunny, etc. Great job though! Very unique  :)

reply.author: VIPO
reply.content: Thanks Nick! Now I'm working with animations. I'will add your suggestions!

title: Great face

author: Jay Controus-Lofton
comment: Since using this face my battery lasts ALL DAY!!! Made me love my watch again. And it's absolutely gorgeous. Outstanding work.
title: Phenomenal!!!

author: Jeremy T.
comment: Interactive update is great! Thanks!

author: Michael Lynady
comment: Great Update

reply.author: VIPO
reply.content: Hey! I will add weather  info in a few days!

author: Andi Taylor
comment: Love this face, looks good and is stretching my LG G Watch R usage to 3 days per charge! Have noticed a bug though -  if you turn the minutes markers off, when the face is active, you can only see the seconds in the space after the minute hand before 0 degrees. So, if it's late in the hour, you can only see the seconds tick for a few seconds before they vanish behind a background again for the rest of the minute. Suspect it's a layer thing... Some more colour choices would be nice, too... Or a colour wheel?

reply.author: VIPO
reply.content: Thanks for rate! I'm working to add some features and bug fixes. I Will think to add colour wheel ;)

title: Great on battery!

author: Brad Harris
comment: This watch face looks amazing. I'm really impressed. I think this is my favorite one so far.
title: Just awesome.

author: Gavin Sumner
comment: Once again this developer has brought us a simple, elegant watch face that isn't too heavy on battery use
title: Another winner for the dev

author: Tim Williamson
comment: Great style. Would love to be able to change colours/setup please.

reply.author: VIPO
reply.content: Hey! The new update have colours customization!

title: Customisation option please

author: Leo Nidas
comment: The numbers are not "sharp". Needs to have those numbers smooth out. Also adding a seconds option color would be nice. More customization would also help.

reply.author: VIPO
reply.content: I'm working on it! It's the first update with config options. Good rate would help!

title: Could be better

author: Raymond Gonzalez
comment: Nice
